script:
1). Do you think I could use your password to sign in?
Sure, but don't tell it to anyone else. 
The sign-in sheet is in the other room.
I'm sorry, but I can't find a pen.
2). When is the deadline for the city-hall expansion story?
Story hour is from 10 to 11.
At the end of the hall on the left.
Noon tomorrow, at the latest. 
3). Where did you last see Ms. Montgomery?
Yes, I can see it on the flat screen.
It was about three weeks ago.
At the First Street coffee shop.
